chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (E1 : env ty) (t : term) (T : ty), j E1 t T -> forall (E2 : env ty) (k : nat), agree E1 E2 k -> length E1 <= k -> j E2 t T

Premises:
Inductive ty : Set := TyIota : ty | TyArrow : ty -> ty -> ty
agree : forall A : Type, env A -> env A -> nat -> Prop
Inductive t : nat -> Set := F1 : forall n : nat, Fin.t (S n) | FS : forall n : nat, Fin.t n -> Fin.t (S n) Arguments Fin.t _%nat_scope Arguments Fin.F1 {n}%nat_scope Arguments Fin.FS {n}%nat_scope
length : forall A : Type, list A -> nat
Inductive j : env ty -> term -> ty -> Prop := JVar : forall (E : env ty) (x : nat) (T : ty), lookup x E = Some T -> j E (TVar x) T | JAbs : forall (E : env ty) (t : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j (insert 0 T1 E) t T2 -> j E (TAbs t) (TyArrow T1 T2) | JApp : forall (E : env ty) (t1 t2 : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j E t1 (TyArrow T1 T2) -> j E t2 T1 -> j E (TApp t1 t2) T2 Arguments JVar _ _%nat_scope [T] Arguments JAbs [E
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
env = fun A : Type => list (option A) : Type -> Type Arguments env _%type_scope
Inductive term : Set := TVar : nat -> term | TAbs : term -> term | TApp : term -> term -> term Arguments TVar _%nat_scope
j_closed : forall (E : env ty) (t : term) (T : ty), j E t T -> forall k : nat, length E <= k -> closed k t
weakening : forall (E : env ty) (t : term) (T : ty), j E t T -> forall (x : nat) (U : ty) (E' : env ty), insert x U E = E' -> j E' (shift x t) T
j_ind : forall P : env ty -> term -> ty -> Prop, (forall (E : env ty) (x : nat) (T : ty), lookup x E = Some T -> P E (TVar x) T) -> (forall (E : env ty) (t : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j (insert 0 T1 E) t T2 -> P (insert 0 T1 E) t T2 -> P E (TAbs t) (TyArrow T1 T2)) -> (forall (E : env ty) (t1 t2 : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j E t1 (TyArrow T1 T2) -> P E t1 (TyArrow T1 T2) -> j E t2 T1 -> P E t2 T1 -> P E (TApp t1 t2) T2) ->...-> P e t t0
j_sind : forall P : env ty -> term -> ty -> SProp, (forall (E : env ty) (x : nat) (T : ty), lookup x E = Some T -> P E (TVar x) T) -> (forall (E : env ty) (t : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j (insert 0 T1 E) t T2 -> P (insert 0 T1 E) t T2 -> P E (TAbs t) (TyArrow T1 T2)) -> (forall (E : env ty) (t1 t2 : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j E t1 (TyArrow T1 T2) -> P E t1 (TyArrow T1 T2) -> j E t2 T1 -> P E t2 T1 -> P E (TApp t1 t2) T2) ->...-> P e t t0
type_preservation : forall t1 t2 : term, red t1 t2 -> forall (E : env ty) (T : ty), j E t1 T -> j E t2 T
JAbs : forall (E : env ty) (t : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j (insert 0 T1 E) t T2 -> j E (TAbs t) (TyArrow T1 T2)
JVar : forall (E : env ty) (x : nat) (T : ty), lookup x E = Some T -> j E (TVar x) T
JApp : forall (E : env ty) (t1 t2 : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j E t1 (TyArrow T1 T2) -> j E t2 T1 -> j E (TApp t1 t2) T2
substitution : forall (E : env ty) (x : nat) (t2 : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j (insert x T1 E) t2 T2 -> forall t1 : term, j E t1 T1 -> j E (subst t1 x t2) T2
closed = fun (T : Type) (H : Lift T) (k : nat) (t : T) => shift k t = t : forall T : Type, Lift T -> nat -> T -> Prop Arguments closed {T}%type_scope {H} _%nat_scope
agree_insert : forall (A : Type) (e1 e2 : env A) (k : nat), agree e1 e2 k -> forall (x : nat) (o : option A), x <= k -> agree (raw_insert x o e1) (raw_insert x o e2) (1 + k)
agree_concat : forall (A : Type) (e : list A) (e1 e2 : env A) (k n : nat), agree e1 e2 k -> k + length e = n -> agree (concat e1 e) (concat e2 e) n
inversion_closed_TAbs : forall (t : term) (k : nat), closed k (TAbs t) -> closed (1 + k) t
length_map : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (e : env A) (k : nat), length e <= k -> length (map f e) <= k
agree_below : forall (A : Type) (e1 e2 : env A) (x : nat) (a : A) (k : nat), lookup x e1 = Some a -> x < k -> agree e1 e2 k -> lookup x e2 = Some a
Lift_Traverse = fun (V : Type) (H : Var V) (T : Type) (H0 : Traverse V T) => {| lift := fun (w k : nat) (t : T) => traverse (fun l x : nat => var (lift w (l + k) x)) 0 t |} : forall V : Type, Var V -> forall T : Type, Traverse V T -> Lift T Arguments Lift_Traverse {V}%type_scope {H} {T}%type_scope {H0}
lift_subst_2 : forall (t : term) (k : nat) (v : term) (s w : nat), s <= k -> lift w k (subst v s t) = subst (lift w k v) s (lift w (1 + k) t)
Subst_Traverse = fun (V : Type) (H : Var V) (H0 : Traverse V V) (T : Type) (H1 : Traverse V T) => {| subst := fun (v : V) (k : nat) (t : T) => traverse (fun l x : nat => subst_idx (lift l 0 v) (l + k) x) 0 t |} : forall V : Type, Var V -> Traverse V V -> forall T : Type, Traverse V T -> Subst V T Arguments Subst_Traverse {V}%type_scope {H H0} {T}%type_scope {H1}
length_insert_independent : forall (A : Type) (e : env A) (k x : nat) (a : A), length (insert x a e) <= k -> forall (y : nat) (o : option A), y < k -> length (raw_insert y o e) <= k
length_insert_reverse_2 : forall (A : Type) (e : env A) (k x : nat) (a : A), length (insert x a e) <= k + 1 -> length e <= k
length_insert_reverse_1 : forall (A : Type) (e : env A) (k x : nat) (a : A), length (insert x a e) <= k -> x < k
Record LiftLift (T : Type) (H : Lift T) : Prop := Build_LiftLift { lift_lift : forall (t : T) (k s wk ws : nat), k <= s -> lift wk k (lift ws s t) = lift ws (wk + s) (lift wk k t) } Arguments LiftLift {T}%type_scope {H} Arguments Build_LiftLift [T]%type_scope _ _%function_scope
length_insert : forall (A : Type) (x k km1 : nat) (o : option A) (e : env A), length e <= km1 -> km1 <= k - 1 -> x < k -> length (raw_insert x o e) <= k
inversion_closed_TApp_1 : forall (t1 t2 : term) (k : nat), closed k (TApp t1 t2) -> closed k t1
inversion_closed_TApp_2 : forall (t1 t2 : term) (k : nat), closed k (TApp t1 t2) -> closed k t2

```coq
intros E1 t T Hj E2 k Hagree Hlen.
induction Hj; intros.
- simpl. rewrite <- Hagree. auto.
- rewrite <- Hagree in *. eapply j_closed in H0. eapply weakening. apply H0. apply Hlen. simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- Hagree in *. eapply j_closed in H0. eapply j_closed in H1. eapply weakening. apply H0. apply Hlen. eapply weakening. apply H1. apply Hlen. simpl. auto.
Qed.
```

original: intros E1 t T Hj E2 k Hagree Hlen. induction Hj; intros. - simpl. rewrite <- Hagree. auto. - rewrite <- Hagree in *. eapply j_closed in H0. eapply weakening. apply H0. apply Hlen. simpl. auto. - simpl. rewrite <- Hagree in *. eapply j_closed in H0. eapply j_closed in H1. eapply weakening. apply H0. apply Hlen. eapply weakening. apply H1. apply Hlen. simpl. auto.
